name: .CRD File Extension
summary: Learn about .CRD files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a CRD file with wxchordpro (Windows) and ChordPro (macOS). To open a CRD file with ChordPro, select File → Open. When you open a CRD file with ChordPro, the app automatically converts it to the ChordPro (cho) format.
You can also open a CRD file with a text editor, such as Microsoft Notepad (Windows), Microsoft WordPad (Windows), or Apple TextEdit (macOS). To open a CRD file with Notepad, select File → Open....

ChordPro can convert CRD files to several formats. When you open a CRD file with ChordPro, the software automatically converts it to the ChordPro (cho) format. You can also convert a CRD file to the Portable Document Format (.PDF) with ChordPro.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
